permissionName.description: The unique name of the permission

displayName.description: The human-readable name of the permission

id.description: The globally unique (UUID) identifier for the permission

tags.description: A list of tags for searching

subPermissions.description: A list of child permissions granted by this permission

childOf.description: A list of permissions that 'own' this permission

grantedTo.description: A list of permission users to whom this permission has been granted

mutable.description: Whether or not this permission changes at runtime

visible.description: Whether or not this permission is visible to users

dummy.description: Is this a temporary dummy permission

deprecated.description: Indicates whether this permissions has been marked for deletion (soft deleted)

moduleName.description: The name of the module (not including version) that defined this permission

moduleVersion.description: The version of the module that defined this permission
